One year ago today, eleven people were killed at the Tree of Life synagogue. They were observing Shabbat at a place that should have been a sanctuary. We have to end gun violence—and we have to speak up against hate, bigotry, and antisemitism. #ShowUpForShabbat

Today marks one year since the massacre at the Tree of Life synagogue, the deadliest anti-Semitic attack in U.S. history. We mourn for the eleven victims, and we remain committed to fighting white supremacist violence as the national security threat that it is.

☑️Guarantee up to 6 months of paid family and medical leave nationwide
☑️Create a Bureau of Children and Family Justice
☑️Cut child poverty by over 50%

With this successful mission POTUS has deepened the destruction of ISIS's physical caliphate which stands as one of the admin’s overarching national security accomplishments. I look forward to continuing to work w @realDonaldTrump to combat terrorism & safeguard our country.
The operation is a major testament to our counterterrorism forces, who go into the most dangerous places in the world to ensure our nation remains secure.

(2/2) Baghdadi's death closes one chapter, but it is not the end of our fight against terrorism. We need a settlement that ends the suffering and destruction in Syria—and ultimately, a long-term plan to counter extremism and allow the region to achieve peace and stability.

(1/2) Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi led a campaign of mass violence and terror that devastated the region and threatened the world. His death is a setback for ISIS and a victory for justice. I am grateful for the skill and courage of our special operations and intelligence professionals.

Está tomando decisiones activas y agresivas q ponen en peligro nuestras elecciones.

Zuckerberg ha estado justificando las decisiones cada vez mas alarmantes d Facebook actuando como si la compañía es un espectador inocente y neutral.

Pero conforme descubrimos más información, es más difícil de creerlo.
- No dijo toda la verdad sobre sus “verificadores d datos.”

Esto es lo q sabemos:

- Zuckerberg “no sabe” cuando él/FB descubrieron el escandalo d Cambridge Analytica. Es difícil de creer.

- Después q Zuck se reunió en privado con Trump & la extrema derecha, ahora esta aceptando anuncios pagados q desinforman.
